# data in 

```{r}
gdsc.dat <- as.data.frame(fread('./../data/GDSC_AUC.csv', sep=','))
gdsc.dat <- gdsc.dat %>% pivot_longer(-V1, names_to='cell_line') %>% mutate(gene = V1, AUC = value) %>% select(-V1, -value)

gdsc.dat %>% tail()

gdsc.dat %>% summary()

```
